articles.author: Marianne Garvey
articles.title: Taylor Swift leads with 8 nods as the MTV Video Music Award nominations are announced - CNN
articles.description: MTV has revealed the nominations for the 2023 “Video Music Awards” (VMAs).
articles.content:
MTV has revealed the nominations for the 2023 Video Music Awards (VMAs).
Taylor Swift leads the pack with eight nominations, including a repeat Video of the Year nod after breaking records last year… [+3405 chars]
